title: flaky test test_run_inputs_outputs
body:
ran into while building 0.11.7 package for neurodebian 16.04:

```
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.interface.tests.test_run.test_run_inputs_outputs
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.7/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 442, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (d,)), **kw)
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.7/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 615, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.7/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/interface/tests/test_run.py", line 770, in test_run_inputs_outputs
    ds.run("touch dummy{}".format(idx), inputs=inputs_arg)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/wrapt/wrappers.py", line 557, in __call__
    args, kwargs)
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.7/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/distribution/dataset.py", line 527, in apply_func
    return f(**kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/wrapt/wrappers.py", line 518, in __call__
    args, kwargs)
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.7/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 499, in eval_func
    return return_func(generator_func)(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/wrapt/wrappers.py", line 518, in __call__
    args, kwargs)
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.7/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 487, in return_func
    results = list(results)
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.7/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 474, in generator_func
    msg="Command did not complete successfully")
IncompleteResultsError: Command did not complete successfully [{'status': u'error', 'message': u'transfer already in progress, or unable to take transfer lock; Unable to access these remotes: origin; Try making some of these repositories available:; \t395cdc5e-95fd-4153-b21d-464202175ae6 -- pbuilder@smaug:/tmp/datalad_temp_tree_test_run_inputs_outputs17DsJJ [origin]', 'annexkey': u'MD5E-s5--ab16016d9717ecbc869d549ac0ca18aa.dat', 'action': u'get', 'path': u'/tmp/datalad_temp_test_run_inputs_outputssTjSyw/b.dat', 'type': u'file', 'refds': u'/tmp/datalad_temp_test_run_inputs_outputssTjSyw'}]
```
